trans-unit.source: The REST APIs for the Azure Batch service offers developers a means to schedule large-scale parallel and HPC applications in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The REST APIs for the Azure Batch service offers developers a means to schedule large-scale parallel and HPC applications in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Azure Batch REST APIs can be accessed from within a service running in Azure, or directly over the Internet from any application that can send an HTTPS request and HTTPS response.
trans-unit.target: Azure Batch REST APIs can be accessed from within a service running in Azure, or directly over the Internet from any application that can send an HTTPS request and HTTPS response.

trans-unit.source: All access to the Batch service requires a Batch account, and the account is the basis for authentication.
trans-unit.target: All access to the Batch service requires a Batch account, and the account is the basis for authentication.

trans-unit.source: The Base URL for Batch service is https://{account-name}.batch.azure.com
trans-unit.target: The Base URL for Batch service is https://{account-name}.batch.azure.com

trans-unit.source: Use these APIs to schedule and run large scale computational workloads.
trans-unit.target: Use these APIs to schedule and run large scale computational workloads.

trans-unit.source: All operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns a request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.
trans-unit.target: All operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns a request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="40ee9ee9-9747-43c2-8dbf-1df983c6e7cb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Requests to the Azure Batch service</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="40ee9ee9-9747-43c2-8dbf-1df983c6e7cb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Requests to the Azure Batch service</link>.
